attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Vaclav Klaus
The Office of the President of the Czech Republic
Prague Castle
119 08 Prague 1
Czech Republic
Referendum 

The British people have been denied a referendum on whether or no the Lisbon Treaty should be ratified. The people of all other European nations have held referendums. We urge HM Government to support the President of the Czech Republic in refusing to ratify this treaty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
